articles.author: Bangkok Post Public Company Limited
articles.title: The American South: A weak link in the Covid vaccination campaign - Bangkok Post
articles.description: BIRMINGHAM (UNITED STATES) - With a sizable Black minority traditionally mistrustful of vaccines and with many conservative rural whites convinced that the vaccine is more dangerous than Covid-19 itself, Southern US states like Alabama have some of the countr…
